page.title: 03 Games We Play In 1985.
page.content: {Pooh Sticks. You need two sticks .You drop them off of one side of the bridge and run to the other side ,the stick that comes out first is the winner. {Chicken. The river bank is a steep gradient and you can play when it's wet and slippery.You've got to run along the bank without stopping or falling into the river .The first person to the end is the winner.The last person is a chicken. {Skimmers. For this game you need a flat,medium weight stone.You bend down slightly and with a sweeping motion of your arm you let the stone go and you should have made it skim lightly over the water.The person who gets the stone the furthest wins.The person who gets it the shortest distance loses.
